question.prompt: If an animal is a dog, it is a _____ animal.
If you look at a dog's mouth, it has forty-two strong _____ for eating.
If a dog wants to dig up soil, it uses its sharp _____ at the end of its feet.
If a dog is healthy, it has a high ability to hear and _____.

hint: Một trong năm giác quan, dùng để ngửi.

question.prompt: If a baby dog is new-born, it cannot _____ or hear.

hint: Một trong năm giác quan, dùng để nhìn.

question.prompt: If baby dogs are hungry, their mother gives them _____.
When baby dogs are four weeks old, they start eating soft _____.
When baby dogs are eight weeks old, they have very strong _____ and can go for long walks.

hint: Bộ phận dùng để đi lại.

question.prompt: If a dog is angry, it opens its mouth and shows its _____.
If a dog is frightened, it lowers its ears and holds its _____ between its legs.
